name: BattleOut
description:
BattleOut Game made For OneButtonJam

Its a Local multiplayer Arcade game. strategy is also involved in this game

Aim of the player is to secure base and to destroy opponent's Base. this Has plenty of fun factor elements.

This game can also be played by 1- 4 players.

Just One Button used to play a game.
